Key Match Events: DeMar DeRozan scored the last 9 PTS for the Kings in double OT
Jaime Jaquez Jr. had a triple-double with 16 points, 12 rebounds and 10 assists for Miami
Tyler Herro scored 26 but was called for a costly 8-second violation toward the end of the fourth quarter
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was tied at 102 at the end of regulation and at 112 after the first overtime
Others: DeMar DeRozan finished with 30 points on 12-of-26 shooting. Domantas Sabonis had 21 points, 18 rebounds and 11 assists as the Kings (18-19) won their second straight without injured point guard Deâ€™Aaron Fox
Malik Monk scored 23 points, Keon Ellis had 17 and Keegan Murray added 14 points and 12 rebounds
Terry Rozier added 18 points, and Haywood Highsmith had 14
